title: Font ID
content:
Does anybody know the serif font used as body text (9 on 10 point?) for features in the British GQ magazine?

Thanks in advance.

Richard Boddy (Art Director, ARTnews magazine)

 [‹ little fat beauty](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320064410/http:/typophile.com/node/43327 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need help with this font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320064410/http:/typophile.com/node/43326 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Richard Boddy

comments.content:
[edit].

Okay, it is not [Mercury](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320064410/http:/www.typophile.com/node/8474). And I guess it neither is [Lexia](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320064410/http:/www.typophile.com/node/1397) nor [Soho](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320064410/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41030).

A sample really would help. Here are [FAQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320064410/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18067) on how to post an image.

Cheers, F
